document_data.mainbody:
oninheim, (which means "Titanhome" in Jotun,) known also as the Bleak Palace, was a citadel in the Ice Spires. 
It was built by Lanaxis and formed the capital of the giant kingdom of Ostoria for over a thousand years. When Ulutiu died and his amulet began to freeze the northernmost part of Faer√ªn, Voninheim was placed under threat by the advancing ice, but Othea, Lanaxiss mother, forbade him from intervening. Lanaxis attempted to defy Othea, but Voninheim was destroyed by the ice.
